description: Detects creation of Microsoft Office files inside of one of the default startup folders in order to achieve persistence.
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Loading a user environment from a backup or a domain controller
name: Potential Persistence Via Microsoft Office Startup Folder
query: ((((((file.path.text:"*\\Microsoft\\Word\\STARTUP*") OR ((file.path.text:"*\\Office*" AND file.path.text:"*\\Program\ Files*" AND file.path.text:"*\\STARTUP*"))) AND file.path.text:("*.doc" OR "*.docm" OR "*.docx" OR "*.dot" OR "*.dotm" OR "*.rtf"))) OR ((((file.path.text:"*\\Microsoft\\Excel\\XLSTART*") OR ((file.path.text:"*\\Office*" AND file.path.text:"*\\Program\ Files*" AND file.path.text:"*\\XLSTART*"))) AND file.path.text:("*.xls" OR "*.xlsm" OR "*.xlsx" OR "*.xlt" OR "*.xltm")))) AND (NOT process.executable.text:("*\\WINWORD.exe" OR "*\\EXCEL.exe")))
